title: Commission Regulation (EC) No 3141/94 of 21 December 1994 fixing the standard fee per farm return for the 1995 accounting year of the farm accountancy data network
header:
COMMISSION REGULATION (EC) No 3141/94 of 21 December 1994 fixing the standard fee per farm return for the 1995 accounting year of the farm accountancy data network
THE COMMISSION OF THE EUROPEAN COMMUNITIES
main_body: The standard fee paid by the Commission to Member States for each duly completed farm return is hereby fixed at ECU 120 for the 1995 accounting year.

This Regulation shall enter into force on the day following its publication in the Official Journal of the European Communities.
It shall apply for the 1995 accounting year.
This Regulation shall be binding in its entirety and directly applicable in all Member States.
attachments:
Done at Brussels, 21 December 1994.
For the Commission
RenĂŠ STEICHEN
Member of the Commission
(1) OJ No 109, 23. 6. 1965, p. 1859/65.
(2) OJ No L 353, 17. 12. 1990, p. 23.
(3) OJ No L 190, 14. 7. 1983, p. 25.
(4) OJ No L 303, 10. 12. 1993, p. 11.
